website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for the most versatile piece in the Le Creuset lineup, this is it. It's great for cooking soups and stews.
pros: This super durable dutch oven can go from stovetop to oven and features a heavy lid to lock in moisture and heat
The well-sized round cast iron pot features a non-stick enamel coating that's easy to clean
cons: It's very heavy and has a high price tag

customer_reviews.title: Not what it’s ‘Cracked’ up to be
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the Le Creuset simply because it is supposed to be the best... we were disappointed when it arrived in an undamaged box, and found the quality and durability not up to par for the hype or the price.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Dutch oven I lost in the divorce
customer_reviews.text: Lost the LC 5 qt. Dutch oven in the divorce. We paid $75 for it at Pigeon Forge Factory Outlets, so 10 years later I rebelled at paying more than four times that amount to replace it. I suffered through so many years without this. And I regret every one. I finally sucked it up and went to buy one--only to discover the Amazon Warehouse link. I paid less than the LC outlet in the Woodburn, OR, factory outlet store and did not find the "obvious flaw" the product was supposed to have. So, watch for the link to other sellers and definitely cash in on one of these. Even without the deal, these are sweet pots.
customer_reviews.author: gailmarie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Color, my second piece
customer_reviews.text: I love my Le Crueset, we call it the Wonder pot for a reason. I'm replacing the one I lost in the Camp Fire of Paradise California, I originally had Caribbean Blue but I went for the signature flame color this time. It arrived on time, but had a small imperfection on the lid. Not enough for me to send it back though but it did not look quite up to Le Cruset par..
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Farris

customer_reviews.title: Makes the best stew!!
customer_reviews.text: I had one like this, same color, about 40+ years ago. This is a larger one and I love it. I especially love the larger handles. Yes, it's still heavy but that's what makes the stew turn out soooo yummy!! Everything cooks so well in it. Even though I'm only cooking for two now, I use it for pretty much everything! Don't even remove it from the stove since it's also pretty to look at (and too heavy to move all the time :)) Can't go wrong with Le Creuset.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I had hoped! "Old world" craftsmanship you can feel that will last a lifetime and beyond. My 9 year old daughter is excited about inheriting it already =) One of those purchases that brings extra joys to cooking (which is already joyous).
customer_reviews.author: andy hong

customer_reviews.title: Factory Second Quality for Retail Prices
customer_reviews.text: I am now waiting on my second replacement for this dutch oven. Both the first and second ones came with defects in the enamel with some of them going down to the cast iron. If I wanted to get a seconds quality oven then I would go to the outlet mall. When I pay $300 for an item I think it is reasonable for it to be perfect. Will hope the third one will be good, otherwise I will be giving up and returning it. I recommend anyone buying from Amazon directly to check over the inside and out for defects.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about my dutch oven!! I've wanted one for some time now and I am so pleased with my purchase; these things made to last with proper care. Beautiful color, purple is my favorite! Silver handles on the lids can also withstand higher temperatures than the black ones for those who don't know.
customer_reviews.author: jaime

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but be careful
customer_reviews.text: This is a very durable pot which heats up quickly. But it's heavy and you need to be careful in handling. Drop it on a ceramic floor or stone counter and you could damage the floor/counter.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Puddled , maybe  Chipped rim!! Seriously!
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived today . So disappointing to see this flaw in the rim . Where’s quality control?!!!! For such an expensive purchase and reputable company I expect perfection...,,,,.sorry! !! Since I’m a first with owning would anyone know will this be a problem? Is my Dutch oven now compromised..,, such a nonsense having to return amidst current situation . Disappointed ! Looks like the beautiful enamel puddled while being covered , in one spot on the rim , size of a matchstick head . I’d add a pic but not getting option currently
customer_reviews.author: MaSher

customer_reviews.title: Worth every dollar
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Le Creuset dutch oven, so I know how fabulous they are. They brown fabulously, hold heat evenly, and clean easily. My first is a 7-1/4 quart dutch oven that we received as a gift 20+ years ago and is still going strong, but it's too big for baking bread and many of the things we make for our family of 4. I should have purchased the 5-1/2 quart years ago, but I didn't want to spend the $$$. I finally bit the bullet because we're baking bread regularly during shelter-in-place. I only wish I had purchased it sooner, so we could have enjoyed it all this time.
customer_reviews.author: JYC

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Expensive, Incredibly Good
customer_reviews.text: Barring a violent natural disaster, I will have this pot for the rest of my life. It is the very model of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: It is a Creuset
customer_reviews.text: There is not much more to say about this versatile pot. If you have never used one, it is enamel covered cast iron, so it is very heavy, The enamel does stain after a while but it does not affect the cooking, We use it on the glass cooktop as well as in the oven. As it is very heavy weight do not drop it on the glass cooktop.
customer_reviews.author: MandBinc

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Money!
customer_reviews.text: Oh. My. God. Everything I make in this thing is delicious!! It cleans right up and it’s so good looking I hate to put it in the cupboard. I’m using it as we speak!
customer_reviews.author: David I.

customer_reviews.title: This pot can cook almost everything!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this pot. I’ve had one for a few years now and it never disappoints! It can be used on top of the stove or in the oven and it’s so beautiful, it adds a lot to the kitchen decor. I was surprised to see how many colors are available.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisb

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get better than this!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Dutch oven. Great size for my Sunday roast, with potatoes and carrots. Falling off the bone tender and juicy roast every time. You can fit a large roasting chicken with room to spare. Large volume of stew and chili. I love this Dutch oven! Just hope I can lift it in the next 20 to 30 years in my golden years as this is heavy. The traditional flame color is fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: R.O. Binson

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best cookware obtainable. It seems like everything we cook in it comes out better somehow. It is a great size for those large batches of soups and stews to feed the crew...
customer_reviews.author: M. Froom

customer_reviews.title: Wow. You can't preheat this?
customer_reviews.text: Bought for wife for baking sour dough bread. My bad for not understanding bread cooking dynamics. Can't preheat first, then add room-temp dough later because the enamel can crack. She does use it for some cooking, and it looks good on the counter, but too expensive for just that in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Watts

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I have a 9 QT Le Creuset and thought that this 5.5 QT would be a lot smaller. That is to say, it is still a large pot and could hold a lot of soup. Color is lovely.
customer_reviews.author: BK 1979

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my nephew and his bride for their shower/wedding gift. Needless to say they LOVE, LOVE, LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: celinda jean

customer_reviews.title: Le Creuset Signature Enameled Cast-Iron 5-1/2-Quart Round French (Dutch) Oven, White
customer_reviews.text: This is a very versatile casserole dish. We use it for just about every stew, soup, or casserole we do for serving 2 to 4 people. Easy to clean with dish soap or baking soda.
customer_reviews.author: Allen H.

customer_reviews.title: 5 qt is the perfect size for my family of 5
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, I've had my "pot" a little over a week and have used it almost daily. The 5.5 qt is the perfect size for my family of 5. It's an adventure finding recipes to fix and am confident that this will becone a family heirloom. Made the best spaghetti and meatballs with very little, effortless cleanup which never happened with my old, cheap Dutch oven. Well worth the cost for this beautiful pot.
customer_reviews.author: Helenj

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pot but will eventually discolor
customer_reviews.text: After 6 years of almost daily use on a gas stove, this workhorse of a pot started discoloring inside.
customer_reviews.author: beatanova

customer_reviews.title: Great pot, unfortunate shipping.
customer_reviews.text: The cast iron pot was beautiful, and the price great, but it arrived cracked and broken. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Merry

customer_reviews.title: No regrets!
customer_reviews.text: The best purchase I have ever made as far as kitchen ware goes. I bake bread in this dutch oven as well as use it to cook a variety of delicious meals in it from stuffed bell peppers to homemade chicken noodle soup to potroast and potatoes. Everything comes out just wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: campromise

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic casserole, I use it every weekend for braising and making soups. It's non- stick if people use it correctly. Remember to start with low heat for 10 minutes before you put it on the stove, then go to medium heat, then put the oil or butter. Let it heat, then put whatever you're cooking. Braised and stewed meats and veggies for 2-3 hours are great and without sticking or cleaning trouble. I had my best results with putting it in the oven at 350 degrees for a 2-3 hours after the initial sautéing on the stove.
customer_reviews.author: Kareem Said

customer_reviews.title: I very much like this pan and my wife keeps on the stove ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a amateur in the kitchen but I made a couple of pro stews with this pot. I hadn't realized how much a difference even heat can make. I very much like this pan and my wife keeps on the stove because it looks so good.
customer_reviews.author: J. Zenor

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful in white
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful in white! Le Creuset, please make more pieces in white !
customer_reviews.author: Sheila A.

customer_reviews.title: Tried the rest, now back to the best!
customer_reviews.text: I have a few Le Crueset pieces but hesitated in spending the money on this large piece. Big mistake. The other "also ran" brand stained and just didn't have the quality you get with Le Creuset. I LOVE this pan! Heavy duty, beautiful, and all that you expect from Le Creuset! Use it all the time and LOVE the fact I have purple cookware! Just get it..... You will be glad you did!
customer_reviews.author: Taos_gal

customer_reviews.title: BUY THE BEST, LEAVE THE TEFLON GARBAGE IN THE TRASH
customer_reviews.text: This is quite possibly the only pot you need in your kitchen. Versatile and resilient. Made in France by people who take pride in this company. You get what you pay for and if you have to take out a loan, do it!
customer_reviews.author: Dean Moriarty

customer_reviews.title: Not as billed about.
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy. Too much work to clean. Taking care of it an inconvenience. Expensive. Value to price not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy Costa

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t get any better than this
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful cast iron. Delicious stews are now common in my apartment. What a wonderful and necessary item missing To tune your chef repertoire.
customer_reviews.author: Guillaume GUY

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This was more expensive than I planned on. However, I have no doubt that it will outlast me. The quality is the very best, something I have not found when purchasing things "made in China' . I would rather pay more up front and not have to replace or feel that I'm eating some of the interior of the pan every time I cook something in it. I would buy again if I could find another size in the same color. I am not fond of some of the new colors, just a personal choice.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doe

customer_reviews.title: It cooks bread as well as the phots by other people that have that Dutch Oven
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pot for bread baking; I absolutely love it , well worth the money. I would highly recommend it to anyone who like to cook or bake breads.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Dumestre

customer_reviews.title: Part of My 'Essentials'
customer_reviews.text: I've browsed Williams Sonoma and Crate & Barrel and wanted one of these for a loooong time. There isn't anything that I would change about this piece of cookware. The hardest part is accepting the price tag and picking a color. I use it as often as my KitchenAid stand mixer and Wusthof 8 inch chef knife. This thing is right up there in terms of kitchenware that I couldn't live without.
customer_reviews.author: S. Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Dutch Oven. Le Creuset's great quality. Love the large flat bottom for searing meats.
customer_reviews.author: Ratz

customer_reviews.title: Most sophisticated LeCrueset
customer_reviews.text: Love leCreuset. Black color is the bomb. You must have it. So sophisticated. Goes with anything and wverythinf
customer_reviews.author: Hal B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Color!
customer_reviews.text: Great dutch oven - but a beautiful color that varies from the edge to the center. My wife loves it and found it so attractive she leaves it out on the center burner like kitchen jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Rep

customer_reviews.title: A great kitchen investment!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to my long term kitchen equipment! I have always wanted a Le Creuset dutch oven, but always thought twice because of the initial cost outlay. I have done my research and this is by far the best heavy duty dutch oven on the market. Perfect for stews, chilis, soups, searing large pieces of meat and you can even finish it in the oven. It also serves double duty as a serving dish. Well worth the cost. It will pay for itself over and over.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Best bakeware and cookware.
customer_reviews.text: I have not found a Le Creuset that I have not liked yet. Great product. Great company
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: I love this pot
customer_reviews.text: I love this pot. I've used it on the stove top for frying and cooking stew and I've used it in the oven for roasting. All around great product
customer_reviews.author: RChambers

customer_reviews.title: review
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived in perfect condition. Le Creuset are the best
customer_reviews.author: robbie

customer_reviews.title: Heavy damage
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived damage. Normal shipping wear to the box, but nothing that would have caused the amount of damage on this product. For the price, this is unacceptable. This piece of cookware should have never made it from the factory. Perhaps the company we purchased from knew they have defective products. Speculation; however, I am skeptical.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this pot!! Use it for everything. It sears nicely and holds the heat and evenly distributes it. Plus, it's a pretty color!
customer_reviews.author: Linda R

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best cooking vessel
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best cooking vessel. Maintains a really even temperature and can be used for all sorts of recipes.
customer_reviews.author: K.Tracton

customer_reviews.title: This is a must cookware piece for the kitchen. ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a must cookware piece for the kitchen.This Dutch oven is well built and heavy.It is very attractive in color.Thanks Robert
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What else can one say to recommend a Le Crueset Dutch oven
customer_reviews.text: What else can one say to recommend a Le Crueset Dutch oven. Expensive of course, but worth every penny. It will last you a lifetime. Absolutely worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: ConsumerDiva

customer_reviews.title: As good as their reputation, a wonderful cooking tool
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my wife, who has always wanted one of these, it will likely be the beginning of a whole collection. These are wonderful to cook in, with all the great attributes of cast iron (even heat, excellent heat retention, can be used on stove top or oven) and the beauty of an old-world classic design. The "Carribean" color is really nice, and I think relatively new to Le Crueset, looking both clean and classy at the same time. The wife loved it... my work here is done. Until I buy the next one, that is.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Park

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Search no more for BEST pricing on Le Creuset! TY
customer_reviews.author: pinc

customer_reviews.title: the best and prettiest
customer_reviews.text: this is my favorite purchase. she's so pretty and Le Creuset is the best.
customer_reviews.author: buybye33

customer_reviews.title: A very nice pot
customer_reviews.text: I very nice, high quality cooking pot. As expected from Le Creuset, the coatings are perfect, and the pot is heavy cast iron. It is a next-generation purchase. It is also quite east to clean. This is a truly fine piece of kitchen equipment.
customer_reviews.author: GWT

customer_reviews.title: Brawny and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy! I have a slightly smaller red one that I've used now for 20 years. Got this for my daughter for a birthday and she loves it for big pots of chili but lots of other things, too. The brand can't be beat and they last forever!
customer_reviews.author: elfillinois

customer_reviews.title: So far I'm glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints. So far I'm glad I bought it. I already knew I would like it anyway. Love that they have my favorite color!!
customer_reviews.author: Purple Raccoon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good, worth the price. Cooks evenly and fast. I love it, will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Mena Bielow

customer_reviews.title: high quality, delivered in good condition
customer_reviews.text: I knew I wanted to buy this for my mother for Christmas. Le Creuset products in general are high quality for the serious cook. She was eyeing this Carribean blue color. I must say, the color is even more pretty in real life. I was concerned about ordering online, as I know how heavy these pans are. The package arrived in perfect condition. Overall, very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I grew up with one of these and have wanted one for a long time. Finally broke down and got one and it is everything I remember and more. Its first excursion was pot roast and it was melt in your mouth perfect. It will get lots of use in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Julia O.

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up too
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt, the most expensive piece of cooking equipment I've ever purchased. That being said, if one is looking for the top of the line and is serious about cooking, the Le Creuset Dutch Oven is just that. Top of the line. Even heating and goes from the stove to the oven. Easy clean up too. I would highly recommend this for anyone that can afford it.
customer_reviews.author: ChiTownArkie

customer_reviews.title: She loved her birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: My wife has wanted one of these for a long time. She loved her birthday gift, and t here will be many wonderful meals to come from it in the future. Aamazon's delivery was amazing! Instead of arriving 2 days after her birthday as was promised, it arrived the day before. Nice work!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love Le Creuset and this color and size were perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love Le Creuset and this color and size were perfect. Unfortunately, there is a nick in the red enamel that reveals the cast iron. I'm ignoring it because I'm too lazy to return it.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Keeler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love cooking with the Le Creuset Cast Iron pot. Cooks evenly and thoroughly every time.
customer_reviews.author: Frances D Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Best Multi-Purpose Pot
customer_reviews.text: The dutch oven shipped on time and was as described. I use it for everything!! I cook for my boyfriend and myself. I can either make a big batch of soup, bread or pasta for the week or I can make a good sized meal for 2. The size is perfect. It is a bit heavy so be careful when handling the hot pan!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah K.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived defective
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived defective with a significant divot in the interior enamel, which I didn't expect when paying full retail price. Returning it was easy, though.
customer_reviews.author: zharon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best cast iron Dutch oven ( 5 1/2 qt) available. We love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Les S.

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Le creuset. The perfect size and is easy to clean. great quality for the price. You will have it forever
customer_reviews.author: Alexsys Heger

customer_reviews.title: It really is the best
customer_reviews.text: Do not listen to the haters. This dutch oven is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous. Now I know why Cooks Illustrated states this is #1
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: My husbands been cooking up a storm.....
customer_reviews.text: This product is top quality. I gave this to my husband for Christmas. He made our pork and sauerkraut on New Year's Day in it and it tasted rich and delicious. Clean up was amazing with the burnt on foods on the side. This past Sunday's dinner was beef stew can't wait to smell and taste this weekends creation. I expect this piece to be in our family for generations to come.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle From Selinsgrove

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful- cooks like a dream. Not sure why I waited so long to buy !
customer_reviews.author: rebekah B. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Made a beautiful xmas gift for my GF - mucho points
customer_reviews.author: Grant Le Sueur

customer_reviews.title: Le Creuset pot
customer_reviews.text: This pot is worth every penny it costs. I make soup, marmalade (from Hartley's Mamade marmalade mix). It is extremely sturdy and can take a lot of abuse, still maintaining it's usefulness. Another great product from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Jean H.Hill

customer_reviews.title: A great asset to my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing addition to my kitchen. The first night I got this pot, I made jumbalaya. What a pleasure to cook and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas McCoy

customer_reviews.title: So useful!
customer_reviews.text: I think we have used this every 2 or 3 days since we started using it. Definitely well worth the money as it is sturdy and very easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: mn.nikki

customer_reviews.title: YOU WILL ENJOY THIS
customer_reviews.text: Have wanted one of these for years. It's winter, and this pot is perfect for soups, stews and much more. The best quality and cooks on the stovetop and the oven.
customer_reviews.author: jvh

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait to roast a lovely dinner in this beautiful cookware.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa F.

customer_reviews.title: Replacement of old trusty Le Creuset
customer_reviews.text: Replacing an older worn out Le Creuset pot that my wife uses often. She's delighted with this new one!
customer_reviews.author: Michael H

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with it. I've saved up for a long time to purchase this soup pot, and thoroughly enjoyed my first soup from it this week! It cooks very evenly on lower temperatures and looks beautiful at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Food, Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: I'm enjoying my purchase! I've cooked bread in it as well as beans, collards, and an all-in-one dish. The only thing I have to get use to is the correct baking time for my oven. As you can imagine pe this pot holds quite a bit of heat, so I have to reduce the baking time to ensure breads aren't dry. As advertised, it cooks thoroughly and evenly and it's easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Good Health

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome gift and it was delivered on time. Wife loves the color and cooks in it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Bearded Lady

customer_reviews.title: The Best Pan On The Market.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I had to return this pan, because the Fennel color green did not match my Mother's kitchen. I was lucky, however, and ended up finding the Kiwi discontinued color at a local Le Creuset Outlet. I have been using these pans for most of my life, having purchased my first when I was 14, and, after using the pan, my mother shares my opinion of Le Creuset, as well. Le Creuset is pricey, however, in my ( and my Mom's) opinion, it is simply the best pan on the market, and it will last forever; I still have the Le Creuset from when I was 14!
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: Mine was just delivered but there are several small places ...
customer_reviews.text: Mine was just delivered but there are several small places around the rim were chipped ... need to exchange and give it another try.
customer_reviews.author: annyandan

customer_reviews.title: They are very versatile and they clean up beautifully
customer_reviews.text: Everyone should own one of these pots. They are very versatile and they clean up beautifully
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fire orange color
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fire orange color, shipped fast, was well protected when shipped, and was a dazzling Christmas gift for my mom. She is so excited to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pot
customer_reviews.text: Initially disappointed in the 5.5 quart versions- I was expecting it to be larger. So I ended up exchanging for the 7 1/4. Much better size for all sorts of cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Ns14

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: These are so darned expensive, but they are so good that buying anything else is almost always a waste of good money. Over the years we have tried a few of these pots made by other manufacturers, but none of them could compare to Le Creuset for quality and longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Ro MaTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It is strong, heavy and well designed. I have made the "no knead" bread in it a number of times and it came out perfect
customer_reviews.author: Bina K

customer_reviews.title: Color great. It's a nice size
customer_reviews.text: Color great. It's a nice size. Pretty heavy duty pit
customer_reviews.author: Jessica D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as I had hoped for. Use it frequently. High quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife as a Christmas gift. She was not disappointed. She loves using it and virtually uses it every day. If you have the means to invest in one (because it is an investment), do so. You will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Farshad A. Dailami

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love?
customer_reviews.text: We have been buying generic versions of the Le Creuset for a couple of years. The other pots have been ok but they degrade quickly. We bought this on sale and couldn't be happier. The enamel is extremely durable and the construction is as everyone claims: wonderful. If you have the funds, please purchase one of these Le Creuset pots.
customer_reviews.author: happy hair

customer_reviews.title: Another Happy & Satisfied Le Creuset Convert
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been wanting one of these High Quality Versatile Cast Iron Pots. It had to be a Le Creuset though or else it wasn't the Best in her opinion. Ended up being a favorite Christmas present this year. I give this Five Stars for its' great design, the fact that it can go from stove top to oven and it's durability. Everything she has cooked in it has turned out wonderful and it is a breeze to clean up. I would recommend this to anyone who is serious about cooking and wants a pot that should last them a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Craig

customer_reviews.title: " but none are made better. I dropped my first one on a stone ...
customer_reviews.text: There are many copies of this "French oven," but none are made better. I dropped my first one on a stone hearth by accident, which cracked the iron side and chipped a lot of the enamel, but my wife and I use this so often, I immediately ordered this replacement. They're expensive but worth the investment. They are a great cooking addition -- and they are not a gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. DidLittle

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Easy to clean. Great for sauteeing, cooking stews, soups.
customer_reviews.author: Bala B

customer_reviews.title: ... wanted one of these for some time Shes very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Wife wanted one of these for some time Shes very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted one of these for years but couldn't justify the price. I'm here to say it was well worth every dime - it cooks evenly every time, goes from stove top to oven with ease and cleans up very easily. I've cooked soups, stews and casseroles in it with great results. love it!
customer_reviews.author: Missbrandymarie

customer_reviews.title: My smaller pot just wasn't big enough.
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. It does everything I expected and more. I really love the way it holds heat and use it for oven or stove top. Clean up is a breeze and it shows no wear and tear like some of my other types of cookware. Great product... Willis in Atlanta
customer_reviews.author: Willis King

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality one expects from Le Creuset. I use this item weekly. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sy Qui

customer_reviews.title: but the quality is great. I already have a 4 Qt LC dutch ...
customer_reviews.text: As with other Le Creuset products the price is high, but the quality is great. I already have a 4 Qt LC dutch oven that I use regularly, but I needed a larger size. We purchased this 5 1/2 quart model and were puzzled that it is virtually the same size as our existing 4 Qt. Using a quart size pitcher, I was able to get just about 5 quarts into the pot, but that was right at the rim. 5.5 quarts? No way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New kitchen-new Dutch Oven
customer_reviews.text: This piece went well with my new kitchen decor and is top quality as Le Creuset always is.
customer_reviews.author: Cary

customer_reviews.title: top of the line cookware
customer_reviews.text: Le Creuset is expensive but worth it. I think things just taste better when they're made in this thing. Plus, it works great for making bread using the method in the book My Bread: The Revolutionary No-Work, No-Knead Method by Jim Lahey.
customer_reviews.author: daveNYC

customer_reviews.title: Love Le Creuset
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter. She loves it. Cooks evenly, looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use it Often, and always a pleasure
customer_reviews.text: cleans up easy. Very durable and well built. Love the colors that Le Creuset has. Over all very nice in appearence and practical use. I hand wash it, and store out in the open because it is such a nice piece. No complaints thus far and have owned for two months and cook with it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: A. L. Dodez

product_meta.title: Le Creuset LS2501-2659 Signature Enameled Cast-Iron Round French (Dutch) Oven, 5-1/2-Quart, Marseille
product_meta.description: Color:Marseille| Size:5.5 qt| Style:OvenDesigned specifically to enhance the slow-cooking process by evenly distributing heat and locking in the optimal amount of moisture, the Signature Collection round French Oven blends the best of the past with the latest innovations for comfort and functionality. Handcrafted one at a time inside our Fresnoy-Le-Grand foundry for nearly a century, Le Creuset round French Ovens have been a fixture in homes and restaurants around the world for generations. Their enduring quality, wide-ranging versatility and stylish colors have made them indispensable in the kitchen and cherished around the table. The maximum oven-safe temperature is 500°F / 260°C.
feature_bullets: 45-percent larger handles that provide a sure grip, even with oven mitts. Dishwasher Safe, Heat Source: Ceramic Hob, Electric Hob, Gas Hob, Grill, Oven safe, Induction hob
The superior heat distribution and retention of le creuset enameled cast iron
An advanced sand-colored interior enamel with even more resistance to wear
A larger composite knob that withstands temperatures up to 500-degree F

Colorful, long-lasting exterior enamel that resists chipping and cracking and dome-shaped lid locks in flavor by promoting continuous circulation of heat and moisture.Stubborn food residue and stains can be removed with a nylon scrubbing pad or sponge
